prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story: What the he'll is going on that we are struggling with these facilities that take care of the mentally challenged or health care for Alzheimer's patients that have other medical issues?  St. Mary's in Grand Junction just discharged a friend who broke a hip and has Alzheimer's without rehab for the hip and no place with beds open for Alzheimer's!  Ludicrous!  The "authorities" closed the facility to accommodate "challenged " residents here last year and re-located them to Denver.  Again, ridiculous!  Our health care system is without compassion and based on the bottom line!  The worst part is drug addicts, emergency room mangers of all sorts can get care but we treat those who have health issues as seniors like shit! Sad state of affairs!  Shame on healthcare and those who do not fight for dignity in end of life care!  Shameful!  Politicians should be shamed for not supporting a bill that cares for these people!
stories: I don't understand what is happening with our facilities that cater to the mentally challenged or healthcare for Alzheimer's patients with other medical conditions. St. Mary's in Grand Junction just discharged a friend who broke a hip and has Alzheimer's without rehabilitation for the hip and no place with open beds for Alzheimer's! Ludicrous! The "authorities" closed the facility to accommodate "challenged" residents here last year and relocated them to Denver. Again, ridiculous! Our healthcare system lacks compassion and is focused on the bottom line. The worst part is drug addicts, emergency room managers of all sorts can get care but we treat seniors like shit when it comes to end-of-life care! It's shameful! Politicians should be ashamed of not supporting a bill that cares for these people!

It is unclear to me what is going on with our facilities that cater to individuals with mental health issues or healthcare for those with Alzheimer's disease and other medical conditions. St. Mary's in Grand Junction just discharged a friend who broke a hip and has Alzheimer's without rehabilitation for the hip and no place with open beds for Alzheimer's! Ludicrous! The "authorities" closed the facility to accommodate "challenged" residents here last year and relocated them to Denver. Again, ridiculous! Our healthcare system lacks compassion and is focused on the bottom line. The worst part is that drug addicts, emergency room managers of all sorts can get care but we treat seniors like shit when it comes to end-of-life care! It's shameful! Politicians should be ashamed of not supporting a bill that cares for these people!

I'm not sure what's happening with our mental health facilities or Alzheimer's care centers. St. Mary's in Grand Junction recently discharged a friend with a broken hip and Alzheimer's without hip rehabilitation or a place with open beds for Alzheimer's. It's absurd! The "authorities" closed a facility last year to accommodate "challenged" residents and relocated them to Denver. Again, unreasonable! Our healthcare system lacks compassion and is focused on the bottom line. The worst part is that drug addicts and emergency room managers of all kinds can get care but we treat seniors like shit when it comes to end-of-life care! It's shameful! Politicians should be ashamed of not supporting a bill that cares for these people!

There are problems with our mental health facilities and Alzheimer's care centers. St. Mary's in Grand Junction recently discharged a friend with a broken hip and Alzheimer's without hip rehabilitation or a place with open beds for Alzheimer's. It's ridiculous! The "authorities" closed a facility last year to accommodate "challenged" residents and relocated them to Denver. Once again, unreasonable! Our healthcare system lacks compassion and is focused on the bottom line. The worst part is that drug addicts and emergency room managers of all kinds can get care but we treat seniors like shit when it comes to end-of-life care! It's shameful! Politicians should be ashamed of not supporting a bill that cares for these people!

Our healthcare system lacks compassion and is focused on the bottom line. The worst part is that drug addicts and emergency room managers of all kinds can get care but we treat seniors like garbage when it comes to end-of-life care! It's shameful! Politicians should be ashamed of not supporting a bill that cares for these people!

It is imperative that we address the issues plaguing our mental health facilities and Alzheimer's care centers. St. Mary's in Grand Junction recently discharged a friend with a broken hip and Alzheimer's without providing them with appropriate rehabilitation or a suitable care facility. This is unacceptable! Last year, the authorities closed a facility to accommodate "challenged" residents and relocated them to Denver. This is also unreasonable! Our healthcare system lacks compassion and is focused on profits, often leaving vulnerable seniors without the care they need. What is most troubling is that drug addicts and emergency room managers of all kinds can receive care, while seniors with end-of-life needs are treated like garbage. This is a shameful state of affairs! It is disgraceful that politicians have not supported a bill that aims to care for these individuals.
